recipe.title: How to Make an Ice Cream Sundae
recipe.intro: An ice cream sundae is the ultimate treat! It is the perfect way to celebrate finishing 30 days of English learning. Let's make it extra special!
recipe.ingredients: vanilla ice cream, chocolate sauce, strawberry sauce, whipped cream, sprinkles, chopped nuts, a cherry, wafer biscuit
steps: **Scoop** two or three balls of vanilla ice cream into a tall glass or bowl.
**Drizzle** chocolate sauce and strawberry sauce over the ice cream.
**Add** a big spoonful of whipped cream on top.
**Sprinkle** chopped nuts and colourful sprinkles over the cream.
**Place** a wafer biscuit on the side and a cherry on the very top.
**Serve** immediately with a long spoon and a napkin. **Enjoy** your masterpiece!

quiz1.explanation_correct: æ­£è§£ï¼"Place ... a cherry on the very top."

review.location: Cairns Night Markets area, Queensland, Australia
review.text: What a spectacular dessert! I visited Sugar Rush Dessert Bar to celebrate my birthday. I ordered the Ultimate Sundae. It had three scoops of ice cream with chocolate sauce, caramel sauce, whipped cream, sprinkles, and a cherry on top. It was huge and absolutely delicious. The ice cream was smooth and creamy. My friends ordered sundaes too and we all shared. The staff even sang Happy Birthday to me! This is the happiest place in Cairns for dessert lovers. Five stars!

quiz2.explanation_correct: æ­£è§£ï¼"I visited Sugar Rush Dessert Bar to celebrate my birthday."

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Welcome! What can I get for you today?

lines.speaker: Jack
lines.text: Hi! I want to celebrate today. Can I have your biggest sundae?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Of course! Our Ultimate Sundae has three scoops with all the toppings!

lines.speaker: Jack
lines.text: That sounds perfect! What flavours do you have?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: We have vanilla, chocolate, strawberry, mango, and cookies and cream.

lines.speaker: Jack
lines.text: Can I have vanilla, mango, and cookies and cream?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Great choices! Which sauce would you like? Chocolate, caramel, or strawberry?

lines.speaker: Jack
lines.text: Chocolate and caramel, please! And extra whipped cream!

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: No worries! One Ultimate Sundae coming right up!

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: It is fourteen dollars ninety. Here you go! Enjoy your celebration!

lines.speaker: Jack
lines.text: Wow, it looks amazing! Thank you so much!

quiz3.explanation_correct: æ­£è§£ï¼"Can I have vanilla, mango, and cookies and cream?"

part_a.full_text: Welcome to Scoops Paradise! What can I get you? Can I taste the mango flavour? Sure, here is a sample spoon. Mmm, that is really good! I will have two scoops, please. Mango and vanilla. Would you like a cup or a cone? A waffle cone, please. And do you want any toppings? Yes, chocolate sprinkles, please. That will be ten dollars. Enjoy!

part_b.full_text: Great news! Reef View CafÃ© is turning thirty years old this weekend! To celebrate, we are giving away free ice cream sundaes on Saturday from twelve noon until two in the afternoon. Every customer will get one free sundae with two scoops of ice cream, chocolate sauce, and whipped cream. You can choose from ten different flavours. There will also be a live band playing music from twelve to three. We want to say thank you to all our wonderful customers. You have been part of our journey for thirty amazing years. We could not have done it without you. See you on Saturday!

try_it.example: I studied English for thirty days! I learned many recipes and cafÃ© words. Now I can help customers in English. I feel more confident at my cafÃ© in Cairns. I want to keep learning every day!
